location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Harford Jones at Tauris to the Resident or Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Sir Harford Jones at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to the Resident or Acting Resident at Bushire, informing that a payment of 10,000 Persian Thomans [Tomans] was made from the account of the Company to Hajee Mohammed Hossein Khan Ameen ed Dowlah [Haji Mohammed Hussein Khan Amin ad Daula], and requesting to provide funds for the payment.
